note.snippet: Gaccha tuvampi mā kaṅkhi, natthi baddhe
‘‘Kathaṃ nu patataṃ seṭṭha, dhamme atthaṃ na bujjhasi
Eso cāpi bahuṃ vittaṃ, labhataṃ yāvadicchati’’

note.original: sabbatthissariyaṃ bhavataṃ (sī. syā. pī.), sabbissariyaṃ bhavataṃ (syā. ka.)

note.snippet: Aṭṭhāsi purato rañño, haṃso vissāsayaṃ byadhaṃ
Kharā ca bandhanā cetā, maccupāsā guhāsayā
Ṭhito dasasu dhammesu, paralokaṃ na santase
kiṇāmi napi vikkiṇāmi, na cāpi me sannicayo ca atthi
nosi ñāti purimāsu jātisu, so maccharī rosako
Taveva atthāya idhāgatamhā, mā pāpadhammo nirayaṃ gamittha’’
Na cāpi me kiñci adeyyamatthi, na cāpidatvā udakaṃ pivāmi
Aladdha maccehi va dānavehi vā, aññatra devehi tadārahaṃ hidaṃ
Na mayhamatthatthi imehi koci naṃ, yāyeva vo seyyasi sā piḷandhatha’’
hi yo sammati dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ, gaṅgāya tīre himavantapassani
Jānāsi maṃ mātali devasārathi, bhuñjassu bhattuttama mābhivārayi
‘‘Bhuttā ca sā dvādasa hanti pāpake, khudaṃ pipāsaṃ aratiṃ daraklamaṃ
Sabbe ca te maccharipañcamādhamā, tasmā adatvā udakampi nāsniye
Āsā ca saddhā ca sirī tato hirī
‘‘Sippena vijjācaraṇena buddhiyā, narā upetā paguṇā sakammunā
Mocā kadalī bahukettha sāliyo, pavīhayo ābhūjino ca

note.original: tassa ca uttare passe (sī. pī.), tassa ca uttarapassena (syā.)

note.snippet: Gantvāna vākyaṃ mama brūhi kosiyaṃ, āsāya saddhā
su vatthaṃ udatārayī rathaṃ, daddallamānaṃ upakāriyasādisaṃ
Tasseva khalu, bho, kuṇālassa sakuṇassa aḍḍhuḍḍhāni itthisahassāni paricārikā dijakaññāyo. Atha khalu, bho, dve dijakaññāyo kaṭṭhaṃ mukhena ḍaṃsitvā
taṃ kuṇālaṃ sakuṇaṃ majjhe nisīdāpetvā uḍḍenti
– ‘‘mā naṃ kuṇālaṃ sakuṇaṃ addhānapariyāyapathe kilamatho ubbāhetthā’’ti
Pañcasatā dijakaññāyo purato purato uḍḍenti – ‘‘mā naṃ kuṇālaṃ sakuṇaṃ gopālakā vā pasupālakā vā tiṇahārakā vā kaṭṭhahārakā vā vanakammikā vā kaṭṭhena vā kaṭhalena vā
leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā sakkharāhi vā

note.original: idaṃ padadvayaṃ sī. pī. potthakesu natthi
note.snippet: pahāraṃ adaṃsu. Māyaṃ kuṇālo sakuṇo gacchehi vā latāhi vā rukkhehi vā sākhāhi vā
thambhehi vā pāsāṇehi vā balavantehi vā pakkhīhi saṅgamesī’’ti
nadītittheneva nadītitthaṃ pabbatasikhareneva pabbatasikharaṃ ambavaneneva ambavanaṃ jambuvaneneva jambuvanaṃ labujavaneneva labujavanaṃ nāḷikerasañcāriyeneva
Tasseva khalu, bho, himavato pabbatarājassa puratthimadisābhāge susukhumasunipuṇagirippabhava
paduma kumuda naḷina satapatta sogandhika mandālaka
nāma phussakokilo paṭivasati ativiya madhuragiro vilāsitanayano mattakkho

sakuṇena saddhiṃ paṭisammoditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho puṇṇamukho phussakokilo taṃ kuṇālaṃ sakuṇaṃ etadavoca – ‘‘kissa tvaṃ, samma kuṇāla, itthīnaṃ sujātānaṃ kuladhītānaṃ sammāpaṭipannānaṃ micchāpaṭipanno’si

Evaṃ vutte, kuṇālo sakuṇo taṃ puṇṇamukhaṃ phussakokilaṃ evaṃ apasādesi – ‘‘nassa tvaṃ, samma jamma vasala, vinassa tvaṃ, samma jamma vasala, ko nu tayā viyatto jāyājinenā’’ti. Evaṃ apasādito ca pana puṇṇamukho phussakokilo tatoyeva
Atha khalu, bho, puṇṇamukhassa phussakokilassa aparena samayena nacirasseva
kharo ābādho uppajji lohitapakkhandikā. Bāḷhā vedanā vattanti māraṇantikā
‘‘Diṭṭhā mayā, samma puṇṇamukha, kaṇhā dvepitikā pañcapatikāya chaṭṭhe purise cittaṃ paṭibandhantiyā, yadidaṃ kabandhe
Ete patī pañca matticca nārī, akāsi khujjavāmanakena
nāma samaṇī susānamajjhe vasantī catutthabhattaṃ pariṇāmayamānā surādhuttakena
Mahī yathā jagati samānarattā, vasundharā itarītarāpatiṭṭhā

note.original: yathā sikhī nadīvāho, anilo kāmacāravā;§nerūva avisesā ca, visarukkho viya niccaphalā;§nāsayanti ghare bhogaṃ, ratanānantakaritthi yoti; (sī. syā.)

alternatives.alternative: yathā sikhī nadīvāho, anilo kāmacāravā;§nerūva avisesā ca, visarukkho viya niccaphalā;§nāsayanti ghare bhogaṃ, ratanānantakaritthi yoti;
yathā sikhī nadīvāho, anilo kāmacāravā;§nerūva avisesā ca, visarukkho viya niccaphalā;§nāsayanti ghare bhogaṃ, ratanānantakaritthi yoti;

note.original: yathā sikhī nadīvāho, anilo kāmacāravā;§nerūva avisesā ca, visarukkho viya niccaphalā;§nāsayanti ghare bhogaṃ, ratanānantakaritthi yoti; (sī. syā.)

alternatives.alternative: yathā sikhī nadīvāho, anilo kāmacāravā;§nerūva avisesā ca, visarukkho viya niccaphalā;§nāsayanti ghare bhogaṃ, ratanānantakaritthi yoti;
yathā sikhī nadīvāho, anilo kāmacāravā;§nerūva avisesā ca, visarukkho viya niccaphalā;§nāsayanti ghare bhogaṃ, ratanānantakaritthi yoti;

note.snippet: ‘‘Cattārimāni, samma puṇṇamukha, yāni (vatthūni kicce jāte anatthacarāni bhavanti; tāni)
parakule na vāsetabbāni – goṇaṃ dhenuṃ yānaṃ bhariyā. Cattāri etāni paṇḍito dhanāni

‘‘Navahi khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, ṭhānehi itthī padosamāharati. Ārāmagamanasīlā ca hoti, uyyānagamanasīlā ca hoti, nadītitthagamanasīlā ca hoti, ñātikulagamanasīlā ca hoti, parakulagamanasīlā ca hoti, ādāsadussamaṇḍanānuyogamanuyuttasīlā ca hoti, majjapāyinī ca hoti, nillokanasīlā ca hoti, sadvāraṭhāyinī
khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, ṭhānehi itthī purisaṃ accācarati
. Vijambhati, vinamati, vilasati, vilajjati, nakhena nakhaṃ ghaṭṭeti, pādena pādaṃ akkamati, kaṭṭhena pathaviṃ vilikhati
, kīḷati kīḷāpeti, cumbati cumbāpeti, bhuñjati bhuñjāpeti, dadāti, yācati, katamanukaroti, uccaṃ bhāsati, nīcaṃ bhāsati, aviccaṃ bhāsati, viviccaṃ bhāsati, naccena gītena vāditena rodanena

vilasitena vibhūsitena jagghati, pekkhati, kaṭiṃ cāleti, guyhabhaṇḍakaṃ sañcāleti, ūruṃ vivarati, ūruṃ pidahati, thanaṃ dasseti, kacchaṃ dasseti, nābhiṃ dasseti, akkhiṃ nikhanati, bhamukaṃ ukkhipati, oṭṭhaṃ upalikhati

tassa na bhaṇati, anatthaṃ tassa carati, atthaṃ tassa na carati, akiccaṃ tassa karoti, kiccaṃ tassa na karoti, paridahitvā sayati, parammukhī nipajjati, parivattakajātā kho pana hoti kuṅkumiyajātā, dīghaṃ assasati, dukkhaṃ vedayati, uccārapassāvaṃ abhiṇhaṃ gacchati, vilomamācarati, parapurisasaddaṃ sutvā kaṇṇasotaṃ vivaramodahati
, nihatabhogā kho pana hoti, paṭivissakehi santhavaṃ karoti, nikkhantapādā kho pana hoti, visikhānucārinī aticārinī kho pana hoti, niccaṃ
sāmike agāravā paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappā, abhiṇhaṃ dvāre tiṭṭhati, kacchāni aṅgāni thanāni dasseti, disodisaṃ gantvā pekkhati – imehi khalu, samma puṇṇamukha, pañcavīsāya
tassa vaṇṇeti, gataṃ tassa na socati
Sevanti hetā piyamappiyañca, nāvā yathā orakūlaṃ
Yo tā mayhanti maññeyya, vātaṃ jālena bādhaye

note.original: kesuci potthakesu imissā gāthāya pubbaddhāparaddhaṃ vipariyāyena dissati
note.snippet: Evaṃ lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjati
Atha khalu, bho, ānando gijjharājā kuṇālassa sakuṇassa ādimajjhakathāpariyosānaṃ
Āvāsu kiccesu ca naṃ jahanti, tasmāhamitthīnaṃ

note.original: haneyyu chindeyyuṃpi chadayeyyuṃ (sī. pī.), haneyyuṃpi chindeyyuṃpi chedāpeyyuṃpi (syā.)
eko ekapamadaṃ hi nālape (pī.) eko ekapamādāya nālape (?)
note.snippet: Uggatejamuragampi āside, eko ekāya pamadāya nālape
Tā gilanti purisassa pābhataṃ, sāgareva makaraṃ timiṅgalo
‘‘Tā kulesu visikhantaresu vā, rājadhāninigamesu vā puna
‘‘So idha garahito parattha ca, dummatī upahato
Hanāsi itthī purise ca mūḷho, maṃsassa hetu adu
Mā tvaṃ imaṃ kevalaṃ vārijova, dvipadādhipa

note.original: tassa orasa atrajo (sī.), tassa atraja oraso (pī.)

note.snippet: ‘‘Tiṭṭhāhīti mayā vutto, so tvaṃ gacchasi pammukho
Idaṃ te samaṇāyuttaṃ, asiñca me maññasi kaṅkapattaṃ’’
Satañca dhammo carito purāṇo, taṃ saṅkaraṃ

note.original: ayaṃ gāthā sī. pī. potthakesu na dissati
ayaṃ gāthā sī. pī. potthakesu na dissati
note.snippet: Siluccayo meru samūlamuppate, na tvevahaṃ rāja musā bhaṇeyyaṃ’’
Tato have dūrataraṃ vadanti, satañca dhammo
Paccattameva sutasoma jānahi, sahassiyā nāma kā atthi

note.original: santo mamaṃ (syā.), santo ca maṃ (sī. pī. ka.)

note.snippet: yathā tiṇakaṭṭhaṃ dahanto, na tappatī sāgarova
‘‘Sakassa dāsassa yadā suṇomi, gāthaṃ ahaṃ atthavatiṃ
mayhaṃ pacchā, citakā ayaṃ tāva sadhūmikāva
Ubhopi te pecca samā bhavanti, kasmā no
Anānutappaṃ paralokaṃ gamissaṃ, yajassu yaññaṃ ada
Api gāthā suṇitvāna, dhamme me ramate
Tato have dūrataraṃ vadanti, satañca dhammo
ve piyaṃ meti janinda tādiso, attaṃ niraṃkacca

note.original: pītvana visassa thālaṃ (sī. pī.), pitvā visamissathālaṃ (syā. ka.)

note.snippet: ‘‘Yo cīdha saṅkhāya piyāni hitvā, kicchenapi sevati ariyadhamme
‘‘Sare yathā vāri janinda vuṭṭhaṃ, ciraṭṭhitīkaṃ naravīraseṭṭha
Na sā bhariyā yā patino na vibheti, na te puttā
‘‘Na sā sabhā yattha na santi santo, na te santo
